phrs.translation: 兴致高的, 热望的, 兴致很高的, 充满热情的
于平淡意大利, 灿烂的意大利
美艳鲜红, 纯情红酒

sentences.sentence: A mob of zombies will stalk the night, and a handful of zesty firms will dance at dawn.
sentences.translation: 一群僵尸企业将在夜间大行其道，而少量的阳光企业则在清晨舞步蹁跹。

sentences.sentence: Eating anywhere in China can be such a zesty, tasty experience that words do no justice.
sentences.translation: 中国任何一个地方的美味佳肴都会让你大饱口福，流连忘返，妙不可言。

sentences.sentence: Dig in to chilli poppers (zesty large chillies oozing melted cheese) or chicken satay with curly fries.
sentences.translation: 大吃一顿辣椒(辣椒从灿烂的奶酪里渗出)或者吃些鸡肉沙爹和炸薯条。
